title: (x) Bodoni-esque type on Bob Paris "Gorilla Suit" book cover - ITC Didi {Mike Y}
content:
speaking of [bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107130449/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/bodoni), is this book jacket done with type or lettering?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107130449im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gorillasuitpdh050907_4585.gif)
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
Looks a lot like ITC Didi. (Image Club had a digital version once). Shows in ’Homage to the Alphabet’ book from Phil’s Photo.

- Mike Yanega
nice. i had started something based on a source that’s very similar to this, but comparing it to Didi i think it’s different enough to go ahead with. you’re amazing, mike! thnx.
